abstract_summ: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is the causative agent of the Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) which is currently negatively affecting the population and disrupting the global economy . Here we report the structure of the SARS-Cv-2 RdRp either in the apo form or in complex with a 50-base template-primer RNA and Remdesivir at 2.5 Å resolution .
